Title: Relates to the minimum age of eligibility for certain commercial driver's licenses
Summary: Lowers the age of eligibility from 21 to 18 for a class A license or for a commercial driver's license which contains an H or an X endorsement or which is valid for operation in interstate commerce.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the minimum age of eligibility for certain commercial driver's licenses
